intro:
Break Mosaic to Save the Girls!
Simulation RPG by Great Think Program!
description:
***** Story *****
You are the game player. Now favorite game is "Angelic Manager", there are many pretty girls in it. But, the pictures have been covered with Mosaic suddenly! Amd you heard a mysterious voice.

"Help... Help me, this world!"

Then you were drawn into the game, and your adventure is started.

***** Overview *****
This is team's turn-based Simulation RPG. Rules are simple and reasonable, but never easy. To win the battle, you must use "Cheer Magic" and "Mosaic Break" well. The most important thing is your inspiration.

***** SESS-AI 2.0 *****
We made the Thinking Program "SESS-AI 2.0". By it, enemy acts so various that you will be amazed. This experience exists only in our game.

***** Language *****
English and Japanese are available.
